src:
Mandek, Ekonomi RI Kuartal III-2019 Cuma Tumbuh 5,02%
05 Nov 2019, 04:14 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta -
Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) mencatat pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia di kuartal III-2019 sebesar 5,02% year on year (yoy). Angka ini jauh lebih rendah dari kuartal III-2018 sebesar 5,17%.Kepala BPS Suhariyanto mengatakan, catatan nilai pertumbuhan ekonomi kuartal III ini disebabkan realisasi investasi yang masih rendah."Perlu jadi catatan bahwa besarnya realisasi investasi di BKPM hanya 14-15% dari total PNBP yang ada di PDB," tutur Suhariyanto di Gedung BPS, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Suhariyanto juga mengatakan, perekonomian global pun diprediksi masih mengalami perlambatan. Hal ini terjadi karena perang dagang Amerika Serikat (AS)-China yang masih terjadi.
"Kalau kita lihat perekonomian global perang dagang masih berlangsung antara US dan china. Ada tensi politik. Berbagai hal ini berdampak pada pelemahan ekonomi pada beberapa negara," jelasnya.Sementara, kata Suhariyanto, secara year to date (ytd) ekonomi Indonesia tercatat tumbuh 5,04%.
"Kalau dibandingkan dengan triwulan II-2019 PE kita masih tumbuh 3,06%. Kalau digabung triwulan I sampai III pertumbuhan ekonomi kita 5,04%" tuturnya.

text:
Stagnant, RI's Economy Quarter III-2019 Has Only Gone 5.02%
05 Nov 2019, 04:14 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta -
The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) recorded Indonesia's economic growth in the third quarter of 2019 of 5.02% year on year (yoy). This figure is much lower than the quarter III-2018 of 5.17%. Head of BPS Suhariyanto said, the record value of economic growth in the third quarter was due to investment realization that was still low. "It should be noted that the amount of investment realization in BKPM was only 14-15% of the total PNBP in GDP, "Suhariyanto said at the BPS Building, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Suhariyanto also said, the global economy was predicted to still experience a slowdown. This happens because the trade war of the United States (US) -China is still happening.
"If we look at the global economy, the trade war is still ongoing between the US and China. There is political tension. These things have an impact on the economic slowdown in several countries," he explained. , 04%.
"When compared to quarter II-2019 our PE still grew 3.06%. When combined from quarter I to III our economic growth was 5.04%," he said.

Check Video "Password: The Government Is Stuck In 5% Economic Growth"
